# penguin_tencentcloud_virtual_machine (Resource)

Manage Tencent Cloud CVM instances via the Penguin service.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "penguin_tencentcloud_virtual_machine" "example" {
  name                 = "vm.example.com"
  zone                 = "ap-guangzhou-6"
  instance_type        = "SA2.MEDIUM2"
  security_group       = "sg-5hilszwp"
  system_image         = "img-7efla8nv"
  vpc_id               = "vpc-oahbq6lh"
  subnet_id            = "subnet-95tfs6am"
  system_disk_size_gib = 20

  bandwidth_limit_mbps = 20
  total_transfer_kb    = 1048576
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `instance_type` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `security_group` (String)
- `subnet_id` (String)
- `system_disk_size_gib` (Number)
- `system_image` (String)
- `total_transfer_kb` (Number)
- `vpc_id` (String)
- `zone` (String)

### Optional

- `auto_renew` (Boolean)
- `bandwidth_limit_mbps` (Number)
- `charge_type` (String)
- `cloud_init_data` (String, Sensitive)
- `elastic_ip_id` (String)
- `period_months` (Number)
- `private_ip_address` (String)
- `project_id` (Number)
- `root_login_password` (String, Sensitive)
- `shared_bandwidth_package_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `cpu` (Number)
- `created_at` (String)
- `default_login_user` (String)
- `expired_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `image_id` (String)
- `instance_id` (String)
- `instance_state` (String)
- `memory_gib` (Number)
- `os_name` (String)
- `password` (String, Sensitive)
- `private_ips` (List of String)
- `public_ips` (List of String)
- `remaining_transfer_kb` (Number)
- `used_transfer_kb` (Number)
